researchLevel.title: Research Level
researchLevel.description: Please select what level of research you have previously done.
researchLevel.beginnerInput: I want to make my first research project!
researchLevel.mediumInput: I won at my school but want to win nationally!
researchLevel.advancedInput: I won nationally and want to further the impact of my research!

researchInterests.title: Research Interests
researchInterests.subtext1: Select up to three research areas you are interested in
researchInterests.subtext2: Select two more research areas you are interested in
researchInterests.subtext3: Select one more research area you are interested in
researchInterests.subtext4: You may review your selections in the next screen

signup.title: Sign Up
signup.name: Name
signup.description: Before we make a connection, we need a little more information.

forms.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters long
forms.confirmMatch: Password and confirm password should match
forms.nameMin: Name must be at least one character long
forms.nameMax: Name can not be longer than 256 characters

snackbar.failedUserCredentials: Unable to fetch the user's credentials
snackbar.duplicateEmailSignup: The email address is already in use by another account
snackbar.errorSignupGeneral: Unable to signup at this time. Please try again.
snackbar.invalidLogin: Incorrect email or password. Please try again
snackbar.tooManyLogin: Too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again later.
snackbar.errorLoginGeneral: Unable to sign in at this time. Please try again later.
snackbar.errorLogout: Unable to log out. Please try again!
snackbar.errorUpdatedName: Unable to update your name. Please try again
snackbar.invalidPasswordChange: The current password you entered is invalid. Please try again.
snackbar.duplicatePasswordChange: You must select a password that you haven't used before.
snackbar.errorUpdatedPassword: Unable to update your password at this time. Please try again.
snackbar.errorUpdatedInterests: Unable to update your interests. Please try again.
snackbar.errorFetchingMentors: Unable to fetch any available mentors at this time. Please try again later.
snackbar.errorStartChat: Unable to chat with the mentor at this time. Please try again later.
snackbar.errorDirectoryFetch: Unable to retrieve the directory of mentors at this time. Please try again later.
snackbar.errorFetchLastMessage: Unable to fetch the last message for this chat.
snackbar.errorUserChatRooms: Unable to fetch the user's message inbox. Please try again later.
